project.name: Monopoly
main-page.title: Main
start.player.name: Choose the name of the {num, number}nd player
start.player.color: Choose the color of the {num, number}nd player
start.text.note: Warning: Do not refresh the page during the game, otherwise the game will be interrupted
validation.max-length.email: Email cannot be longer than 30 characters
validation.max-length.first-name: First name cannot be longer than 30 characters
validation.max-length.login: Login cannot be longer than 20 characters
validation.max-length.password: Password cannot be longer than 40 characters
validation.max-length.phone: Phone cannot be longer than 15 characters
validation.max-length.second-name: Second name cannot be longer than 30 characters
validation.min-length.email: Email must be at least 5 characters
validation.min-length.first-name: First name must be at least 1 character
validation.min-length.login: Login must be at least 4 characters
validation.min-length.password: Password must be at least 4 characters
validation.min-length.phone: Phone must be at least 10 characters
validation.min-length.second-name: Second name must be at least 1 character
validation.min-length.player_name: Player name must be at least {min, number} character
validation.max-length.player_name: Player name cannot be longer than {max, number} characters
validation.pattern.player_name: Player name can only contain letters and numbers
